programme.title: Mek Gyver
programme.desc: Setelah balik dari membaiki singki di rumah Senah, Zarra balik dengan muka yang masam kerana sakit hati dengan Zainal yang memperlekehkan kerjanya. Senah memarahi Zainal kerana malas bekerja dan ingin meminang Zarra sekiranya Zainal seorang yang rajin. Aizul merupakan kawan Zarra, telah mengajak Zarra untuk bekerja denganya, tetapi Zarra tidak mahu bekerja sepenuh masa. Leman tukang terkejut mendengar Senah, mak Zainal turut memanggil Zarra untuk membaiki singki di rumahnya. Zarra masih mengharapkan tawaran kerja yang dimintanya tetapi belum ada apa-apa jawapan.

programme.title: Selamat Datang Cinta
programme.desc: Yasmin dan Rayyan datang mengunjungi Ariana dengan niat hendak memujuk Ariana agar menghadiri majlis perkahwinan mereka yang akan diadakan di resort Hakim tidak lama lagi. Jemputan itu membuatkan Ariana berbelah bagi. Sebagai sahabat, tentu saja Ariana mahu menghadiri majlis perkahwinan kawan baiknya, cuma lokasi pilihan mereka yang membuatkan Ariana terkedu dan tak berani untuk menjanjikan kehadirannya.

programme.title: Renjana
programme.desc: Che Amenah merupakan seorang gadis yang berasal daripada Pulau Pinang, dan dia mempunyai minat yang besar dalam pelajaran. Beliau mendengar akan sebuah sekolah perempuan pertama yang bakal dibuka di Kedah, oleh Ku Yahya bin Ku Zainal Abidin, Penguasa Pelajaran Kedah yang pertama, Che Amenah tampil membuat pemohonan untuk menjadi guru yang pertama. Nyata kecekalan dan keazaman seorang guru wanita yang melakar sejarah selaku Cikgu pertama, Sekolah Perempuan Pertama di Tanah Melayu tidak sia-sia dan berbaloi.

programme.desc: mengisahkan pasangan suami isteri Anwar dan Zarra yang mengalami pelbagai kejadian mistik selepas membeli sebuah gudang untuk perniagaan jubinnya. Anuar, seorang tauke gudang tidak menyangka dia menjalankan perniagaan di atas tanah kubur. Mereka tidak menduga bahawa gudang tersebut menyembunyikan satu rahsia sehingga menimbulkan konflik dalam rumah tangga. Kehadiran pasangan ini juga tidak disenangi 'sesuatu' yang sekian lama mendiami gudang kosong itu. programme.title: Nur
programme.desc: Aisyah bercadang membangunkan produksi sendiri dengan bantuan bakal mertua Adam. Nur terpegun dengan hujah Adam terhadap soalan yang dikemukakan tempoh hari. Tanpa disedari, mereka diperhatikan.

programme.title: Nur
programme.desc: Seluruh keluarga tergempar apabila gambar Adam bersama Nur, gadis lorong menjadi viral di media sosial. Adam menerima pelbagai tohmahan sekaligus menjatuhkan maruah keluarganya. Apakah reaksi Dr Khadijah, bakal tunangnya?

programme.title: Nur
programme.desc: Suatu hari, Adam berjaya berjumpa dengan Nur yang menolak cinta Adam kerana telah menjadi tunang kepada Dr Khadijah. Keluarga Dr. Khadijah dan Adam telah bersetuju untuk mempercepatkan pernikahan mereka pada minggu berikutnya

programme.title: Nur
programme.desc: Tiada istilah bebas dan aman sepanjang hidup Nur bersama ibunya. Di sudut lain, berat hati Adam meneruskan hari pernikahannya dengan Khadijah, kerana di sebalik itu tersimpan rasa sayangnya pada Nur

programme.title: Saat Hilang Cintamu
programme.desc: Razil, seorang suami sejati, cintanya kepada Salina tidak pudar walau dia diselingkuhi dan menceraikannya. Dengan rela dia kekal dekat dengan anak-anak dan tinggal di pondok kecil juga sanggup menjaga isterinya selepas kemalangan tragis. Kisah berasaskan kisah benar ini mengundang emosi mendalam.

programme.title: Sahabat Backpackers
programme.desc: Sebuah travelog kembara yang mengajak penonton mengembara ke Sabah dan Sarawak merungkai kisah-kisah kehidupan dengan paparan gaya hidup kini tetapi masih mengekalkan nilai-nilai murni.

programme.title: Kembara
programme.desc: Bersama Hos, Shahrul Kamal membawa penonton mengembara dan mencuba pelbagai aktiviti luar di Outworld Rafting MY, Gopeng, Perak

programme.title: Sudirman Chow Kit Road
programme.desc: Sudirman - Chow Kit Road! merupakan sebuah dokumentari yang mengupas perjalanan dan kenangan nostalgia seorang lelaki berbadan kecil tetapi mempunyai jiwa yang besar, Sudirman Haji Arshad untuk mengadakan konsert percuma yang menyatukan rakyat malaysia berbilang kaum di tengah tengah jalan Chow Kit dan ianya merupakan satu fenomena besar suatu ketika dahulu, sehinggakan ianya masih terpahat di hati rakyat Malaysia

programme.title: DM Hati Awak
programme.desc: Alina, Seorang wanita sunyi mula mengenali lelaki misteri (Mr. X) melalui media sosial, namun hubungan mereka diuji apabila identiti sebenar dan niat masing-masing mula terbongkar.

programme.title: Tok Guru
programme.desc: Inggeris berbincang tentang ada Raja-Raja Melayu yang tidak setuju dengan Malayan Union. Dr Burhanuddin Helmi ceramah tentang Jus-soli (hak kerakyatan sama rata) yang patut ditolak.

programme.title: Mr Delicious
programme.desc: Melina muncul dalam hidup Aiman seorang gadis baru yang memikat perhatian Aiman. Ketiga sahabat merasa cemburu dan tidak yakin.

programme.title: Terima Kasih Ibu
programme.desc: Nil, seorang pelajar bermasalah, memukul rakan hingga maut. Ibunya yang menyebelahi dia mengabaikan nasihat guru. Selepas dibebaskan dari Sekolah Juvana, Nil terus terlibat jenayah dan dihukum berat. Kisah ini menyorot hubungan ibu-anak yang kompleks, pengabaian ibu bapa dan akibat tindakan anak bila tiada batas disiplin.

programme.title: Pembancuh Kopi Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Walaupun kecewa dengan permintaan Puan Sri Ayuni namun Nuzul bersetuju untuk meninggalkan Irsyad dan kehidupannya di Kuala Lumpur. Namun apa yang Puan Sri Ayuni tidak tahu adalah hakikat Nuzul sebenarnya adalah anak angkat saja. Nazrul bukanlah adik kandungnya namun kasih sayangnya pada Nuha, Nurin dan Nazrul tidak berbelah bahagi. 20 tahun yang lepas, Puan Izzah dan Encik Aziz telah mengambilnya sebagai anak angkat. Waktu itu dia baru saja berusia empat tahun. Walaupun hanya anak angkat, dia tidak pernah dilayan seperti orang asing. Dia disayang dan dihormati sebagai anak sulung dalam keluarga tersebut. Setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia, Nuzul sanggup menggalas tanggungjawab untuk menjaga adik-adiknya. Dia berhenti belajar dan bekerja demi menampung kehidupan adik-adiknya. Meninggalkan Irsyad bukanlah sesuatu yang senang namun dia redha. Nuzul mengemas apa yang patut dan dia menulis sepucuk surat untuk Irsyad. Nuzul menitipkan suratnya pada Puan Sri Ayuni. Puan Sri Ayuni rasa bersalah namun apa yang dilakukan adalah demi masa depan Irsyad. Nuzul juga meninggalkan surat perletakan jawatannya di Rayyan Caf di bilik Saiful. Ini akan membawa Irsyad kembali dalam hidupnya. Nuzul dan adik-adiknya akhirnya pergi dari Kuala Lumpur. Meninggalkan memori, cinta dan Irsyad.

programme.title: Mr Delicious
programme.desc: Melina muncul dalam hidup Aiman seorang gadis baru yang memikat perhatian Aiman. Ketiga sahabat merasa cemburu dan tidak yakin.

programme.title: Baby Tak Gila
programme.desc: Setelah menghadapi pelbagai rintangan, Baby dan Akram melihat harapan baru dalam hubungan mereka.

programme.title: Saat Aku Tahu
programme.desc: Zarif menafikan kecurangannya dan Ameena bermain bersama. Bersembunyi di sebalik senyuman, dia memerhati setiap pergerakan dan setiap pembohongan. Apa yang bermula sebagai penyiasatan rahsia tidak lama lagi bertukar menjadi permainan berbahaya apabila Ameena mula mempersoalkan siapa yang benar-benar boleh dipercayainya

programme.title: Aroma Masak
programme.desc: Mimi Ernida selaku hos musim ini akan menyediakan 3 menu istimewa

programme.title: Bakar
programme.desc: Untuk episode kali ini, Chef Kim akan berkongsi dengan penonton, cara menyediakan Quiche Bayam & Salted Chocolate Tart.

programme.title: Terima Kasih Ibu
programme.desc: Nil, seorang pelajar bermasalah, memukul rakan hingga maut. Ibunya yang menyebelahi dia mengabaikan nasihat guru. Selepas dibebaskan dari Sekolah Juvana, Nil terus terlibat jenayah dan dihukum berat. Kisah ini menyorot hubungan ibu-anak yang kompleks, pengabaian ibu bapa dan akibat tindakan anak bila tiada batas disiplin.

programme.title: HURU HARA
programme.desc: Huru hara ini membincangkan tentang dunia hiburan, perjalanan kerjaya tetamu jemputan dan persembahan artis. Artis jemputan pada episod kali ini adalah Hani Fadzil, NJWA, Alyssa Azmi dan Sufian Suhaimi.

programme.title: SEMBANG SELEBRITI
programme.desc: Sembang selebriti merupakan rancangan bual bicara bersama selebriti yang menceritakan tentang pengalaman mereka di dalam dunia seni tanahair yang boleh dijadikan sumber inspirasi. Episod kali ini menampilkan Killa Driz sebagai selebriti jemputan.

programme.title: RESEPI MOYANG
programme.desc: Dalam episod ini, hos akan belajar memasak masakan tempatan iaitu Laksa Johor & Kuih Dadar Gulung. Dihos oleh Mek Yun.

programme.title: RONDA RODA
programme.desc: Ronda Roda kali ini, menampilkan kereta Lexus, Volks Maniacs dan Modenas Jaguh. Yang dihoskan oleh Mira Rizam dengan mempamerkan kereta baru dari Lexus NX dan hasil tangan dari Arief dan Aidiel.

programme.title: EKSPRESI FESYEN
programme.desc: Aliya Marissa akan berbual fesyen bersama pengasas jenama Mimpi Kita. Untuk segmen GRWM (get ready with me), penonton akan mendapat idea untuk bergaya bersama tetamu jemputan, Nina Amin yang merupakan seorang model dan pengacara.

programme.title: GIRLS ONLY

programme.title: TERBAIK DARI JALANAN

Untuk episod kali ini, mereka akan pergi ke Nasi Kerabu Serai Kayu, D'Simpang Mee Celup, Cocktail Cedok Sendiri Viral dan RZQ Bubur Nasi Kangkung Belacan.

programme.title: E Cinni
programme.desc: Sebuah film thriller Turki yang mengikuti seorang wanita yang terjerat dalam permainan kejahatan setelah mendapatkan akses ke teknologi yang berbahaya.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP12
programme.desc: Ritz semakin gelisah kerana Alia masih tidak pulang ke rumah. Dalam keadaan panik dia menghubungi Zacky dan secara tidak langsung mendedahkan identiti Alia. Adam yang diserang pengikut Amir diikat dan ditahan dalam sebuah pondok bersama Alia. Pihak polis tiba namun Amir sempat lari dengan mengheret Alia bersamanya. Adam berjaya menjejaki mereka dan menyelamatkan Alia setelah Amir terbunuh dalam pertarungan. Sementara itu, Zacky lega apabila bapanya menunjukkan tanda-tanda pulih. Dalam masa yang sama dia mengesyaki Sophie merancang sesuatu yang buruk. Rafeeq pula tidak dapat mengawal perasaan setelah mengetahui Affiyah masih hidup. Dibertekad untuk membunuh Affiyah dan Ritz.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Dabbe Zehr-i Cin
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sebuah keluarga yang diganggu makhluk jin akibat perbuatan sihir dan iri hati. Teror mengerikan semakin memuncak apabila racun jin memusnahkan hubungan kekeluargaan, memaksa mereka mencari perlindungan melalui rawatan Islam dan ruqyah.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP11
programme.desc: Dr Flora menegur dan menyalahkan Ritz kerana membenarkan Alia mengambil pil depresi dan pil tidur. Ritz mempertahankan tindakannya atas alasan tidak mahu ingatan Alia kembali pulih. Atas desakan, Ritz menjelaskan peristiwa silam yang menyebabkan bapanya terbunuh dan nyawa Alia terancam.Sementara itu Zack sedih melihat keadaan bapanya yang koma angkara perbuatan datuknya sendiri.Dia bertekad untuk melaporkan perbuatan datuknya selama ini kepada pihak polis. Tengku Fateh, sepupu Zacky, membantu dengan memberi maklumat serta bukti. Mereka sependapat tidak mahu ikut cara bapa-bapa dan datuk mereka menguruskan perniagaan keluarga.Dalam perjalanan pulang Alia diculik oleh sekumpulan lelaki bertopeng. Adam diserang ketika memeriksa kereta Alia yang tersadai disebatang jalan. Ritz yang tidak tahu tentang kejadian resah menunggu kepulangan Alia.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP12
programme.desc: Ritz semakin gelisah kerana Alia masih tidak pulang ke rumah. Dalam keadaan panik dia menghubungi Zacky dan secara tidak langsung mendedahkan identiti Alia. Adam yang diserang pengikut Amir diikat dan ditahan dalam sebuah pondok bersama Alia. Pihak polis tiba namun Amir sempat lari dengan mengheret Alia bersamanya. programme.title: A Nightmare Wakes
programme.desc: Adaptasi daripada novel "Frankenstein," seperti yang diceritakan melalui kehidupan Mary Shelley. Semasa dia mencipta karya agungnya, dia melahirkan seekor raksasa.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP13
programme.desc: McCall bergegas mencari Dante apabila dia diculik oleh sepasang anggota polis yang panik yang takut akan tindakan balas, selepas mereka menahan Dante tanpa sebab dan menggunakan kekerasan yang berlebihan sebelum menyedari bahawa dia seorang rakan polis.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP14
programme.desc: McCall menerima rayuan terdesak untuk mendapatkan bantuan yang membawanya ke dalam konfrontasi dengan Mason Quinn. McCall membentuk pakatan sementara dengan pengendali CIA yang mengikut peraturan.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP15
programme.desc: Kerja vigilante McCall merumitkan lagi kehidupan peribadinya apabila dia terpaksa meminta bantuan bekas suaminya, Dr. Miles Fulton, untuk membantu mangsa tembakan, salah seorang daripada dua wanita yang diburu pencuri selepas mereka menyaksikan rompakan.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP16
programme.desc: Apabila Aunty Vi merupakan satu-satunya juri dalam perbicaraan pembunuhan yang percaya bahawa defendan tidak bersalah, McCall secara rahsia menyiasat kes itu untuk mencari bukti bahawa naluri Vi adalah betul.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP12
programme.desc: Ritz semakin gelisah kerana Alia masih tidak pulang ke rumah. Dalam keadaan panik dia menghubungi Zacky dan secara tidak langsung mendedahkan identiti Alia. Adam yang diserang pengikut Amir diikat dan ditahan dalam sebuah pondok bersama Alia. Pihak polis tiba namun Amir sempat lari dengan mengheret Alia bersamanya. Adam berjaya menjejaki mereka dan menyelamatkan Alia setelah Amir terbunuh dalam pertarungan. Sementara itu, Zacky lega apabila bapanya menunjukkan tanda-tanda pulih. Dalam masa yang sama dia mengesyaki Sophie merancang sesuatu yang buruk. Rafeeq pula tidak dapat mengawal perasaan setelah mengetahui Affiyah masih hidup. Dibertekad untuk membunuh Affiyah dan Ritz.

programme.title: East of Mountains
programme.desc: Seorang pakar bedah bersara yang menghidap kanser terminal pulang ke kampung halaman dengan niat menamatkan hidupnya, namun perjalanan bersama anjingnya bertukar menjadi pengembaraan yang menguji ketabahan dan kebijaksanaan dirinya.

programme.title: Detik 12 Malam EP2
programme.desc: Perantara Siaful Azmi berkongsi pengalaman mengenai kisah penggali kubur di Pantai Dalam, Kuala Lumpur. Pekerjaan menggali kubur merupakan pekerjaan sambilan yang dilakukan secara tradisional. Perantara berjumpa dengan penggali kubur di sana, En. Jamian Man, En Ishak Hamilan dan Yussman Nordin yang berkongsi pengalaman bertemu dengan lembaga misteri dan kejadian menakutkan saperti berjumpa dengan lelaki berjubah putih, sekumpulan lembaga dan bunyi yang menakutkan. Perantara kemudiannya berada di kawasan tersebut bersama krew, mereka terdengar bungi menyeramkan, azan dan menjawab salam diberi.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP6
programme.desc: Haridz dikunjungi seorang lelaki misteri. Ganesh tidak tahu tentang kejadian ini, dia sendiri fikir kes ini sudah habis, namun kemudiannya mayat Pokwe ditemui di kawasan kampung.

programme.title: Munafik
programme.desc: Adam merupakan seorang pengamal perubatan Islam yang tidak dapat menerima hakikat isterinya sudah tiada di dunia ini. Kemudian, dia bersetuju untuk merawat seorang wanita yang tertekan bernama Maria tetapi perkara aneh dan meresahkan mula berlaku.

programme.title: Longlegs
programme.desc: Ejen FBI Lee Harker menyiasat rangkaian pembunuhan keluarga yang dikaitkan dengan pembunuh misteri Longlegs. Ketika menjejaki jejak okultisme dan kod rahsia, Lee mendapati kaitan peribadi yang mengancam nyawanya dan semua yang dia sayangi.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP6
programme.desc: Haridz dikunjungi seorang lelaki misteri. Ganesh tidak tahu tentang kejadian ini, dia sendiri fikir kes ini sudah habis, namun kemudiannya mayat Pokwe ditemui di kawasan kampung.

programme.title: Ganjil
programme.desc: Nabila kehilangan rantai lehernya dalam mimpinya. Apabila Amry mencadangkan mereka mencari rantai di rumah Nabila, dia mendapati kebenaran yang tidak selesa.

programme.title: Detik 12 Malam EP2
programme.desc: Perantara Siaful Azmi berkongsi pengalaman mengenai kisah penggali kubur di Pantai Dalam, Kuala Lumpur. Pekerjaan menggali kubur merupakan pekerjaan sambilan yang dilakukan secara tradisional. Perantara berjumpa dengan penggali kubur di sana, En. Jamian Man, En Ishak Hamilan dan Yussman Nordin yang berkongsi pengalaman bertemu dengan lembaga misteri dan kejadian menakutkan saperti berjumpa dengan lelaki berjubah putih, sekumpulan lembaga dan bunyi yang menakutkan. Perantara kemudiannya berada di kawasan tersebut bersama krew, mereka terdengar bungi menyeramkan, azan dan menjawab salam diberi.

programme.title: Sosok Ketiga
programme.desc: Apabila Nuri menerima Yuni yang merupakan sahabat baiknya, sebagai madunya, dia mencetuskan siri supernatural dan konflik mendalam bagi memenangi semula cinta hati suaminya.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Setelah berhijrah, Hasnah/Ana bertemu seorang lelaki dan menjalin hubungan bersamanya - namun dia sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai anak sebaya dengannya.

programme.title: Reaksiar
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman dan reaksi artis-artis jemputan setelah melihat kembali klip-klip lakonan mereka.

programme.title: Ruang Temu

programme.title: Jeritan Batinku
programme.desc: Fauziah, seorang anak yatim yang sering didera ibu saudaranya, Ramlah, nekad melarikan diri ke bandar. Tindakannya itu telah membawanya ke Sharif yang bertindak menjadikannya sebagai anak angkat. Namun, kehadiran Fauziah tidak disenangi Mahani. Sikap cemburu Mahani hanya membawa padah kepada dirinya. Selain itu, perasaan serba salah Ramlah menyebabkannya mengalami tekanan jiwa. Mampukah Fauziah mengecapi kebahagiaan?

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Reaksiar
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman dan reaksi artis-artis jemputan setelah melihat kembali klip-klip lakonan mereka.

programme.title: One,Two,Trivia

programme.title: Ruang Temu

programme.title: Kad Cinta
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Sayang Ibu
programme.desc: Setelah kematian bapa akibat satu kebakaran, kehidupan Tiara dan ibunya menjadi semakin sulit. Mereka berdua kemudiannya menumpang tinggal di sebuah pondok. Tiara mempunyai suara yang merdu dan dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi di sebuah Syarikat rakaman. Ketika berada di kota, Tiara meminta jasa baik teman lelakinya untuk menguruskan hal ehwal ibunya di kampung. Namun, teman lelakinya itu menyalahgunakan wang yang diberikan oleh Tiara untuk ibunya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Fitrah Adam
programme.desc: Fitrah Adam mengupas tentang masalah dan cabaran yang dihadapi kaum lelaki dalam kehidupan. Malah, mereka sebagai ketua keluarga dalam membina sahsiah rumah tangga dan menjadi pemimpin.

programme.title: (L) TVS Pagi

programme.title: (DL) World News
programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih 2
programme.desc: Lanjutan dari Ketika Cinta Bertasbih yang mengisahkan Azzam kembali ke Indonesia selepas 9 tahun belajar di Kairo. Walaupun sudah bergelar sarjana, dia sukar cari kerja dan dipengaruhi tekanan masyarakat. Sambil menambah pengalaman berniaga, Azzam juga berdepan konflik cinta apabila wanita yang dicintainya telah dipinang sahabatnya, sementara Eliana yang menyukainya sendiri belum dapat diterimanya sebagai pilihan hati.

programme.title: Fat Buddies
programme.desc: Seorang bekas agen rahsia J yang cedera dan menjadi obes selepas misi, masih bertekad menjalankan tugas penting. Dalam perjalanannya ke Jepun untuk mendapatkan dokumen sulit, dia bertemu seorang pengawal keselamatan besar badan, Hao Yingjun. Mereka tak dijangka bekerjasama dalam satu misi komedi berbahaya melibatkan sindiket dadah, penuh aksi lucu, cabaran pelik dan situasi goofy sepanjang pengembaraan mereka.

programme.title: The Swords Woman
programme.desc: Di era Dinasti Ming, anak perempuan seorang pegawai tinggi menjadi buruan selepas keluarganya diburu akibat politik istana. Semasa melarikan diri, dia bertemu seorang sarjana dan bersama mereka mempertahankan diri daripada musuh sambil mencari kebebasan dan keadilan. Filem ini terkenal dengan aksi pedang klasik wuxia dan adegan seni mempertahankan diri yang berpengaruh dalam sejarah filem Asia.

programme.title: Zharfa
programme.desc: Filem ini mengisahkan Zharfa, seorang gadis Malaysia yang penuh pemberontakan dan emosional, sejak ditinggalkan oleh ayah kandungnya ketika berusia satu tahun. Selepas ibunya berkahwin dengan lelaki licik, konflik antara Zharfa dan bapa tirinya semakin memuncak. Akhirnya, dia dihantar ke sebuah pesantren di pedalaman Jawa Barat, Indonesia, di mana wataknya terus berkembang dalam latar budaya dan agama yang kuat

programme.title: Sampai 7 Keturunan
programme.desc: Dalam satu peraduan cabutan bertuah, Aidil telah terpilih untuk memenangi percutian lima hari empat malam di sebuah hotel lima bintang serta wang tunai sebanyak lima ribu ringgit. Namun begitu, disebabkan isterinya Syikin yang sedang hamil, Aidil memutuskan untuk tidak mengambil percutian tersebut. Walaupun begitu, Aidil berasa sayang untuk melepaskan hadiah itu begitu sahaja. Dia memberikan wang tunai dan tiket tersebut kepada Pak Karim, yang pada mulanya keberatan untuk menerimanya kerana bimbang meninggalkan ayam kesayangannya. Setelah dipujuk berkali-kali, Pak Karim akhirnya bersetuju walaupun masih risaukan ayamnya.

programme.title: The Pursuit Of Happyness
programme.desc: Chris Gardner, seorang ayah tunggal, menghadapi kesusahan kewangan selepas pelaburan perniagaannya gagal. Dia berjuang untuk mencari pekerjaan sambil menjaga anaknya, Christopher. Kisah ini menunjukkan ketabahan, pengorbanan dan harapan, ketika Chris berusaha mengubah nasib hidup mereka dan mencapai impiannya walaupun melalui cabaran yang berat.

programme.title: One, Two, Trivia
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merungkai fakta-fakta menarik yang tersimpan dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan

programme.title: Kasut Ku Kusut
programme.desc: Kasut Ku Kusut mengisahkan seorang pemuda kampung bernama Manap yang berasa kecewa kerana kasut barunya telah hilang. Sementara itu, Markos, ahli kumpulan gangster Father Dragon, ditugaskan untuk membawa Suzi kepada ketua geng. Dalam perjalanan, mereka tersesat di sebuah kampung, dan Suzi berjaya melarikan diri lalu bertemu dengan Manap yang masih mencari kasutnya. Ketika Markos menemui mereka, Manap menyedari bahawa kasut yang dipakai oleh Markos kelihatan sangat mirip dengan kasutnya yang hilang.

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Tony Eusoff yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Hantu Tok Mudim
programme.desc: Sekumpulan lelaki muda cuba menakutkan penduduk kampung dengan cerita hantu Tok Mudim untuk mengaut keuntungan, tapi akhirnya mereka sendiri terjerat dalam situasi lucu

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Tony Eusoff yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Salina
programme.desc: Salina tinggal di sebuah banglo cantik yang mempunyai sejarah misteri. Apabila kejadian aneh dan menakutkan mula berlaku, terutamanya terhadap anak-anaknya, Salina mula menyiasat sejarah banglo itu untuk melindungi mereka. Namun, keadaan menjadi semakin teruk sehingga membawa kepada kematian yang tidak dijangka.

programme.title: Surga Di Telapak Kaki Ibu
programme.desc: Kisah Bayu, remaja yang hidup bersama ibunya setelah ayahnya meninggal. Bayu merasa tertekan kerana kemiskinan dan sering menyalahkan ibunya atas nasib mereka. Namun, ketika ibunya jatuh sakit, Bayu mula menyedari kasih sayang dan pengorbanan besar seorang ibu serta pentingnya taat dan berbakti kepadanya.

programme.title: Melawan Takdir
programme.desc: Filem ni kisahkan perjalanan hidup Quraisy Mathar sendiri (pengarah filem ni). Ia mengangkat pengalaman hidupnya yang penuh cabaran sejak kecil kehilangan orang tersayang, jatuh bangun dalam hidup, sampai berjaya jadi seorang sineas. Cerita ni tunjuk bagaimana semangat, doa, dan keyakinan boleh buat seseorang bangkit walaupun diuji dengan pelbagai takdir yang pahit.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih
programme.desc: Cerita tentang Azzam, seorang pemuda yang berpegang teguh pada nilai-nilai Islam, berusaha menuntut ilmu sambil mengekalkan cinta kepada Tsuraya. Mereka menghadapi pelbagai ujian, konflik keluarga, dan rintangan sosial, namun keyakinan dan keimanan membimbing mereka menempuh cabaran cinta dan kehidupan.

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Saleha
programme.desc: Saleha mengisahkan seorang gadis baik hati yang ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya dan dibesarkan oleh nenek. Selepas diculik dan kehilangan neneknya, dia dipersalahkan dan dihalau oleh keluarganya. Dengan semangat dan keimanan yang teguh, Saleha memulakan hidup baru di Jakarta sambil menyembunyikan penyakit serius.

programme.title: Istri Serakah Lurah Yang Amanah
programme.desc: Dewi (Sylvia Fully) dan Haris (Rexy Rizky) ialah pasangan suami isteri, dengan Haris sebagai ketua kampung yang amanah, manakala Dewi bersikap tamak dan gilakan harta. Dewi menyalahgunakan jawatan Haris dengan menyelewengkan wang bantuan sosial ke akaun peribadinya, sehingga penduduk menyalahkan Haris apabila bantuan gagal disalurkan. Apabila kebenaran terbongkar, Haris murka dan menuntut Dewi menghentikan perbuatannya.

programme.title: Cinta Di Ujung Sajadah
programme.desc: Rindu dan Fauzan terpaksa berdepan dengan kenyataan pahit apabila penipuan masa lalu Rindu terbongkar. Fauzan yang marah mengusir Rindu keluar dari rumah, dan Rindu berjuang untuk mendapatkan hak penjagaan anak mereka, Ayu. Dalam penyesalan, Fauzan mula menyedari bahawa cintanya terhadap Rindu masih belum padam. Namun, segalanya menjadi rumit apabila Fauzan berkahwin dengan wanita lain bernama Alia. Di sisi lain, Rindu berkenalan dengan Hafiz yang benar-benar menyayanginya.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: OFFICE
programme.desc: The investigation following a sales manager brutally killing his entire family leads to a track of mystery and tragedy in an overwhelmed work team at Seoul.

programme.title: THE EXCLUSIVE: BEAT THE DEVIL'S TATTOO
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: LOVE RESET
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: THE ROUNDUP: NO WAY OUT
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: THE BOX
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: OMNISCIENT READER: THE PROPHECY
programme.desc: Dok-ja is the only reader of an obscure web novel for 10 years. Suddenly, the apocalyptic world of the novel becomes reality. He and the novel's omnipotent hero strive to save the world.

programme.title: HITMAN 2
programme.desc: Jun is working on a new webtoon season when he receives an email with a gripping plot. He draws it, but soon real-life terrorism mirrors the storyand Jun becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: STEAL MY HEART
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: VICTORY
programme.desc: In 1999, Pil-sun and Mi-na team up with cheerleader Se-hyeon to form the cheerleading team 'Millennium Girls' with seven other girls for their high school soccer team, aiming for victory.

programme.title: CONFIDENTIAL ASSIGNMENT 2: INTERNATIONAL
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: REVOLVER
programme.desc: Su-young gets entangled in corruption and takes the blame for a reward. After her release, she finds Andy who promised her the reward but faces a bigger force behind him.

programme.title: THE NIGHT OWL
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely can see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: MONTAGE
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: I-LAND2 : N/a
programme.desc: Girl version of ENHYPEN is coming! The ultimate survival variety program by top producer TEDDY, following the creation of the next generation K-pop girl group.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea's passion for heat to a global stagemixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber's license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber's license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: The Genius Paik 3
programme.desc: Chef Paik returns with his dream team and takes on the challenge to introduce Korean cuisine in France.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea
programme.desc: Yum Jung-ah, Ahn Eun-jin, Park Jun-myun, Dex and special guests are visiting seaside villages in Korea. They will live there and cook fresh seasonal dishes using ingredients from the sea.

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber's license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: Dear X follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: Dear X follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Seoul At Home
programme.desc: Michelin star chef Alvin Leung will show us how to make molecular Korean cuisine at home!

programme.title: Seoul At Home
programme.desc: Michelin star chef Alvin Leung will show us how to make molecular Korean cuisine at home!

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Hello Missfortune
programme.desc: In a multidimensional domain, Poon Siu-yu (Erica Chan) enters the second dimension after her death in the first dimension, i.e. the mortal realm. She then joins Office of the Life Authority and becomes a novice destiny administrator. Siu-yu has to keep a close watch on food courier Chan Pei-ho (Hubert Wu), who is in the mortal realm. Pei-ho earns a meager living regardless of the weather. But his family members just do not care about him. He is already overwhelmed by life pressures, and he is also jinxed by bad spirit Siu-yu while doing his job. Siu-yu gradually sympathizes with Pei-ho. Meanwhile, Pei-ho also realizes this mysterious girl has covertly helped him a lot. The duo then even recklessly start a romantic relationship that is probably going to have no future.

programme.title: Pages Of Treasures
programme.desc: Bookshop staff FONG HOK MAN (Chun Pui) always believes that knowledge is power. He tries hard to encourage his older son FONG SUM MING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and his younger son FONG SUM CHING (Suen Eric) to study more. Unfortunately, MING is not good at studying at all and he quits after secondary school. On the other hand, CHING is a very smart boy and MING works hard overseas to support CHING's further studies on computer sciences in America. The two brothers return to Hong Kong eventually and they work in the same commercial building. CHING works as a senior network security engineer while MING works as a junior security guard. MAN worries that the difference in their job ranking will hinder their relationship. MING admires a girl YUEN WAI CHUNG (Kwok Sonija) who opens a paper mud figure shop. MAN tries to help MING establish his career by buying a secondhand bookshop for him to operate. However, MAN doesn't realize that the virtual world is gradually manipulating his family. CHING meets a romanticist TSU HEI MAN (Yeo Vivien) at work which creates misunderstanding between him and his girlfriend, LUI YUEN YI (Yeung Shirley). MAN's younger daughter FONG SUM MEI (Ho Lily) indulges herself in the virtual world and she is suspected for stealing exam papers on the internet

programme.title: Legend Of Master Chai, The
programme.desc: In Heaven, Chai (Leung Wing Chun) killed Huen (Ho Po Sang) over a pot of sweet lotus seed soup. He was expelled to earth to suffer, while at the same time, he had to help Huen and Nui, who were also sent down to earth, to regain their powers. Chai was punished to become the stupid and shabby son, of an earthly man. Huen, on the other hand, was his handsome and clever brother, who was loved by all. One day, Chai regained his magic power and started to challenge Huen. Their relationship worsened as they both fell in love with Nui (Leung Siu Bing)

programme.title: Legend Of Master Chai, The
programme.desc: In Heaven, Chai (Leung Wing Chun) killed Huen (Ho Po Sang) over a pot of sweet lotus seed soup. He was expelled to earth to suffer, while at the same time, he had to help Huen and Nui, who were also sent down to earth, to regain their powers. One day, Chai regained his magic power and started to challenge Huen. Their relationship worsened as they both fell in love with Nui (Leung Siu Bing)

programme.title: Silver Chamber Of Sorrows, The
programme.desc: Sheung's Silver Chamber, the largest jewel company in Foshan, Guangdong Province China, is facing serious financial difficulties. In order to obtain a loan from SHUM's family, SHEUNG HANG (Chun Pui), owner of the Chamber, together with his primary wife, CHOI SIU-DIP (Sit Ka Yin), plot to arrange marriage between SHEUNG WAN (Ng Wai Kwok), HANG's younger brother, and SHUM WING-TUNG (Young Yuen Yee), daughter of SHUM's family. Fueled by hatred, CHING SAU-HANG (Ng Wing Mei), WAN's lover, marries HANG and ironically becomes WAN's sister-in-law. WAN falls out with HANG, and opts to live abroad and disconnects from his family. After leaving home for years, WAN does not return home until the occasion to celebrate his father's birthday. Tension between the two brothers comes to a head when HANG is reluctant to pay ransom to save the youngest son of WAN. WAN is determined to disconnect completely from his family ever since. Since WAN's return, SAU-HANG suffers from her husband's neglect and gets framed for causing the fourth concubine FEI FEI's (Wu Ting Yan) miscarriage. Hatred leads her to commit act that revenge. She seeks to subvert SHEUNG's family by luring KWAN. Intentionally, she unveils TSAU KUK (Yeung Sze Ki), the maid in the family, is HANG's illegitimate daughter. The dark age of a once-prominent family begins

Fueled by hatred, CHING SAU-HANG (Ng Wing Mei), WAN's lover, marries HANG and ironically becomes WAN's sister-in-law. WAN falls out with HANG, and opts to live abroad and disconnects from his family. After leaving home for years, WAN does not return home until the occasion to celebrate his father's birthday. Tension between the two brothers comes to a head when HANG is reluctant to pay ransom to save the youngest son of WAN. WAN is determined to disconnect completely from his family ever since. Since WAN's return, SAU-HANG suffers from her husband's neglect and gets framed for causing the fourth concubine FEI FEI's (Wu Ting Yan) miscarriage. Hatred leads her to commit act that revenge. She seeks to subvert SHEUNG's family by luring KWAN. Intentionally, she unveils TSAU KUK (Yeung Sze Ki), the maid in the family, is HANG's illegitimate daughter. The dark age of a once-prominent family begins

programme.title: Hello Missfortune
programme.desc: In a multidimensional domain, Poon Siu-yu (Erica Chan) enters the second dimension after her death in the first dimension, i.e. the mortal realm. She then joins Office of the Life Authority and becomes a novice destiny administrator. Siu-yu has to keep a close watch on food courier Chan Pei-ho (Hubert Wu), who is in the mortal realm. Pei-ho earns a meager living regardless of the weather. But his family members just do not care about him. He is already overwhelmed by life pressures, and he is also jinxed by bad spirit Siu-yu while doing his job. Siu-yu gradually sympathizes with Pei-ho. Meanwhile, Pei-ho also realizes this mysterious girl has covertly helped him a lot. The duo then even recklessly start a romantic relationship that is probably going to have no future.

programme.title: Pages Of Treasures
programme.desc: Bookshop staff FONG HOK MAN (Chun Pui) always believes that knowledge is power. He tries hard to encourage his older son FONG SUM MING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and his younger son FONG SUM CHING (Suen Eric) to study more. Unfortunately, MING is not good at studying at all and he quits after secondary school. On the other hand, CHING is a very smart boy and MING works hard overseas to support CHING's further studies on computer sciences in America. The two brothers return to Hong Kong eventually and they work in the same commercial building. CHING works as a senior network security engineer while MING works as a junior security guard. MAN worries that the difference in their job ranking will hinder their relationship. MING admires a girl YUEN WAI CHUNG (Kwok Sonija) who opens a paper mud figure shop. MAN tries to help MING establish his career by buying a secondhand bookshop for him to operate. However, MAN doesn't realize that the virtual world is gradually manipulating his family. CHING meets a romanticist TSU HEI MAN (Yeo Vivien) at work which creates misunderstanding between him and his girlfriend, LUI YUEN YI (Yeung Shirley). MAN's younger daughter FONG SUM MEI (Ho Lily) indulges herself in the virtual world and she is suspected for stealing exam papers on the internet

MAN's younger daughter FONG SUM MEI (Ho Lily) indulges herself in the virtual world and she is suspected for stealing exam papers on the internet

programme.title: Legend Of Master Chai, The
programme.desc: In Heaven, Chai (Leung Wing Chun) killed Huen (Ho Po Sang) over a pot of sweet lotus seed soup. He was expelled to earth to suffer, while at the same time, he had to help Huen and Nui, who were also sent down to earth, to regain their powers. Chai was punished to become the stupid and shabby son, of an earthly man. Huen, on the other hand, was his handsome and clever brother, who was loved by all. One day, Chai regained his magic power and started to challenge Huen. Their relationship worsened as they both fell in love with Nui (Leung Siu Bing)

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: Report important news about Hong Kong, cross-strait, and international affairs.

programme.title: Who Wants A Baby?
programme.desc: An unexpected pregnancy catches couple TONG TIM-YEE (Ali Lee) and IP CHI-TING (Lai Lok Yi) off guard. They depend on their mothers for baby-sitting, but conflict ensues when the in-laws' parenting skills are poles apart. The emotionally wrought and physically challenging experience of caring for their baby girl 24/7 leaves them no other choice but to hire an experienced confinement nanny, WONG KAI-MIU (Griselda Yeung), to help them. The arrival of her newborn forces TIM-YEE to give up her fashion career; whereas CHI-TING has to say goodbye to his relaxing and enjoyable nightlife. In order to spend more time to look after her daughter, TIM-YEE changes her career to take over a post-natal care agency. With KAI-MIU pulling a few strings, TIM-YEE gets to know many expectant couples and nannies. In her role as a new mom, she is struck with a newfound appreciation, but feels like she and her husband CHI-TING are growing apart. On top of that, she even suspects that he has an affair with his coworker bartender HUI CHING (Samantha Ko). Surprisingly, CHI-TING captivates the internet after bravely saving a child in an accident, and is dubbed the greatest dad ever, which makes the agency a childcare KOL, turning things upside down

programme.title: Christian's Choice
programme.desc: Hong Kong's culinary industry has been buffeted by the pandemic, economic downturn, and a surge in consumer spending in mainland China, putting its precious culinary culture at risk. Some restaurants remain steadfast, honing their craft day after day, adapting to changing circumstances. They're sharing these challenging times with their customers through exceptional culinary skills and delicious cuisine, a journey that brings growth to the community. Adhering to the principles of authentic, independently owned restaurants with a long history, host Christian Yang curates a selection of "Friends" restaurants, exploring the hidden, heartwarming stories behind these establishments, tasting their extraordinary signature dishes, and appreciating the fighting spirit of Hong Kong's culinary culture.

programme.title: Hands Up 2026
programme.desc: The brand-new children's program Hands Up encourages kids to ask questions bravely, express themselves, and pursue their goals! Members of the mascot Sauce Family join the hosts in performing short skits, accompanying everyone for joyful moments. The show will also feature a variety of children's songs, allowing kids to sing along while learning practical life knowledge.

programme.title: Legal Mavericks 2020
programme.desc: Blind barrister Man Sun-hop (Vincent Wong), aka Perception Man, has a superlative fourth sense. He teams up with female legal executive Chiu Ching-mui (Sisley Choi) and private investigator Kut Yat-ha (Owen Cheung) to seek justice for the underprivileged. They never hesitate to use tactics that involve pushing the boundaries. Barrister Shaw Mei-la (Kelly Cheung) earnestly approaches Sun-hop. They are then to fight it out in court. Also, Mei-la's pupil master Kan Siu-wang (Paul Chun) constantly back Mei-la up. While Sun-hop was serving his pupillage with his pupil master Siu-wang, a homicide case involving some missing corpse had caused Shifu and his disciple to become foes. Sun-hop presents new evidence and lodges an appeal for the defendant. He and Siu-wang again confront each other, causing successive rounds of conflict. Meanwhile, the emergence of Mei-la brings about subtle changes in the formidable Sun-hop, Ching-mui and Yat-ha's triangular relationship.

programme.title: Legal Mavericks 2020

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: News Treasury 2026
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveif we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Cantopop At 50
programme.desc: Throughout the years, countless hit songs have emerged in both Chinese and international music scenes. Regardless of the era, every work has its own devoted fans. " Cantopop At 50" invites original singers or accomplished vocalists to reinterpret these once-popular classics that transcend generations, delivering high-quality musical enjoyment to music lovers. In addition to featuring influential senior artists in the music industry, the program also welcomes many singers who have not appeared in public for a long time, bringing multiple surprises to the audience.

programme.title: News Magazine 2026
programme.desc: "News Perspective" is a weekly program featuring in-depth coverage of notable news stories from Hong Kong and around the world. It focuses on social issues that matter most to Hong Kong residents and invites people from various sectors, scholars, and experts to discuss and analyze the underlying causes and developments.

programme.title: J Music 2026
programme.desc: J Music is dedicated to creating a high-quality music platform, providing singers with opportunities to showcase their musical talents while allowing music fans to gain a deeper understanding of their musical stories. The program invites popular singers as guests, who personally select their favorite new and old works, perform them live, and share their favorite tracks. New faces in the music scene will also appear, showcasing their musical potential through interactive exchanges. Furthermore, each episode closely follows the latest developments on the Jade Solid Gold Chart, featuring music videos and interviews with various singers, songwriters, and producers, who discuss their work and the people and events within the music industry.

programme.title: Christian's Choice
programme.desc: Hong Kong's culinary industry has been buffeted by the pandemic, economic downturn, and a surge in consumer spending in mainland China, putting its precious culinary culture at risk. Some restaurants remain steadfast, honing their craft day after day, adapting to changing circumstances. They're sharing these challenging times with their customers through exceptional culinary skills and delicious cuisine, a journey that brings growth to the community. Adhering to the principles of authentic, independently owned restaurants with a long history, host Christian Yang curates a selection of "Friends" restaurants, exploring the hidden, heartwarming stories behind these establishments, tasting their extraordinary signature dishes, and appreciating the fighting spirit of Hong Kong's culinary culture.

programme.title: Music Money Monster
programme.desc: Pushing the limits of vocal range and precise timing, the brand-new interactive music game show Music Money Monster" is hosted by Sammy, Eric Kwok, and Lee Yin-tung. A professional pitch analysis system tests the contestants. A nine-square grid represents nine difficulty levels. Contestants who connect three lines to "pass the level" can choose to withdraw their winnings, continue the challenge, or even attempt the most difficult Monster level. Failure results in zero prize money! The amateur version allows solo participants to compete for a top prize of NT$100,000. The celebrity version offers viewers a chance to win prizes and gifts by interacting with the contestants in the live stream and sending emojis to cheer them on.

programme.title: Finance Magazine 2026
programme.desc: "Financial Insights" keeps a close watch on the market, reviewing weekly trends in Hong Kong stocks and paying attention to the real estate sector. Through exclusive interviews with industry professionals and market analysis, the program explores popular local and international finance topics in a clear and accessible manner. It also features in-depth reports on the challenges faced by different industries as they develop.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong brings together global cuisines, and its unique dishes and down-to-earth fare have captured the close attention of discerning food lovers! Food hosts and presenters such as Icy Wong,Snowy Choi,Carmen Ngai,Carmaney Wong , Jessica Liu , Gillian Ng keep up with the latest food news and deals, delving into the stories behind the flavors. Gathering firsthand information on popular eateries across various platforms, the hosts personally line up and taste the food, providing genuine reviews. Even takeout-only eateries with no dine-in option are in high demandwhat are the must-try picks? Running a food business inevitably comes with its own mix of sweet, sour, bitter, and spicy experiences. The production team follows the proprietors through their busy day, from sourcing ingredients and preparing materials to opening for business, uncovering the "stories behind the flavors."

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Jade Channel reports important local, cross-strait, and international news every afternoon at 6:30.

programme.title: Sunday Report 2026 & Trick Or Cheat
programme.desc: " Sunday Report" focuses each week on popular newsmakers with feature reports, or takes a human-centered approach by visiting people from various social strata and industries to explore in depth political, social, and livelihood issues that concern the public.

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4
programme.desc: " Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4" has officially launched, continuing the success of the previous three seasons and once again providing a stage for singing enthusiasts to pursue their dreams. This season expands its recruitment efforts to North America and Australia, with several TVB artists participating "masked," igniting the flame of music globally and illuminating the hearts of countless dreamers. Stephanie Che continues to host, offering her warm smile to the contestants; Maria Cordero, Chow Kwok-fung, Cheung Ka-tim, Hai-er, and Gu Ya-wei also serve as judges, providing professional feedback and encouragement to the participants. On this new season's stage, everyone will weave an even more moving chapter with music, continuing the heartfelt story of " Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4."

programme.title: Star Weekly
programme.desc: The talk show "Star Weekly" invites celebrities and industry leaders each episode, along with entertainment anchors such as Au Wing-Kuen, Hsu Wen-Hsuan, and Wang Chen-Chuan, to share their recent work plans and discuss special topics related to movies, television, and concerts, especially people and events that netizens and friends in the industry are concerned about and discussing! With so much surrounding information, the show features a special "Fact Check" segment, where guests personally respond to various rumors, allowing the parties involved to clarify the truth!

programme.title: Gourmet Express Weekly
programme.desc: Hong Kong is a melting pot of global cuisine! Food anchors and hosts like Carmaney Wong,Carmen Ngai,Gillian Ng stay up-to-date with the latest culinary trends, gathering information on top-rated restaurants from various platforms. The hosts personally sample the food and provide honest reviews; they uncover hidden gems in different districts and invite long-time expatriates to visit their favorite hometown eateries; renowned chefs and food critics also guide the way, offering expert recommendations. The program features a selection of popular restaurants featured in "Food News Report," highlighting their signature dishes and delivering quick deals, ensuring viewers stay up-to-date with the most delicious and affordable dining information.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: Reporting major news from Hong Kong, across the Taiwan Strait, and around the world, as well as sports updates, keeping you informed about important events and trends in the world of sports.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. "The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the Sanfu herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

programme.title: Flying Swords of Dragon Gate
programme.desc: This is a remake of the original 1966 classic, Dragon Gate Inn. The country is being policed by the East and West Bureaus, whilst the Emperor's eunuchs have attained much power and control. With all the corruption, Zhao teams up with a group of assassins to systemically kill the eunuchs in order to save the country.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: OMG! Mom's Big News
programme.desc: 53-year-old Rita and her husband are planning retirement when she discovers she's unexpectedly pregnant, upending their quiet family life. As they prepare for the baby amid chaos and laughter, they learn profound lessons in love and acceptance. Just as peace returns, Rita learns the fetus may have Down syndrome, confronting her with the ultimate crossroads

programme.title: Last Song For You
programme.desc: That summer, young Xia and Su bonded over their love of music, wondering how far this love could take them. Years later, musician Su unexpectedly reunites with his first love, Xia, in a hospital during their darkest hours. Seeing his inner struggle, the ailing Xia sends Su on a final journeyher parting gift to reignite his life.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Legends of the Condor Heroes: The Gallants
programme.desc: Under Genghis Khan's command, the Mongol army sweeps west to crush the Jin Dynasty, with the Song Dynasty as its next target. Amidst internal conflicts among martial arts sects, Guo Jing and Huang Rong unite the warriors of the Central Plains to defend Xiangyang, exemplifying courage and loyalty in the fight for the nation.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Mei's dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the child's unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kong's biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Ching's wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Ready O/R Rot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi are finally getting married but pressure from Guy's mother creates much friction between them. Meanwhile, Grey Bear suspects his wife of cheating on him and Ken faces the biggest crisis of his life when Jessica accidentally gets pregnant. Can they eventually solve their relationship problems?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Shaolin's Hung falls in love with Fang while escaping the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung's son creates a new form of martial art combining his parents' kung fu styles.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu's disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chen's past insult.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend's grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Paap O Meter
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.desc: Film tells the story of Janaki who becomes the victim of an inhuman activity, her unexpected encounter with Adv. David Abel Donovan and how she fights for her justice challenging the court and the judiciary system of India.

programme.title: Irumbuthirai

programme.title: Devi 2

programme.title: Game Changer

programme.title: Kurukshetra

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: One of the strongest storms on record in Florida's Big Bend region, Hurricane Idalia, makes landfall. Wildfires ravage Oregon as communities flee to safety. A deadly hailstorm hits Colorado.

programme.title: Legendary Tigers of India
programme.desc: In the jungles of north west India, there lives a remarkable wild tiger family. Now, using 50 years of footage, the story of their matriarchal clan is pieced together.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: Robson's adventure concludes as he journeys into the wilderness of Argentina, on the hunt for a peculiar fish called the Pacu.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: Explore the southern edge of the Pantanal, where brown capuchin monkeys live in their own Garden of Eden. Dry season in the highlands treats them well until a drought dries up their food sources. Can an industrious agouti save them from starvation?

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: Trek through the forests and savannahs of the Pantanal's Nhecolndia region, which is home to noisy herds of peccaries. Follow these pig-like mammals on their daily food-foraging routes, and run into roseate spoonbills and capybaras along the way.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: In the heart of Brazil, the largest cat in the Americas, the magnificent jaguar, reigns over a magical land filled with natural beauty and diversity.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: Join a group of wildlife scientists tracking the comeback of the ocelot in the Pantanal. Check in on their network of trail cameras, which capture the movements of this elusive spotted cat, and see the perils it faces, including giant anacondas.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands
programme.desc: Explore a 1,500-year-old monastery among the dizzying crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. Spy Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, then chase after pygmy shrews on Clare before heading to the Aran Islands for a peek at an autumn spectacle.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Follow the course of South Africa's Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: New Kids In The Wild
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who's honing her survival skills in Brazil's Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina's coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria's side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: Feel the enchantment of Brazil's Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Becoming Elephant: the Orphans of Reteti
programme.desc: Explore community-run Reteti Elephant Sanctuary, where human surrogate moms offer survival lessons and nurture young elephants through play. Bond with trunkless Long'uro and see why six-year-old Kelele's mysterious illness could delay his release.

programme.title: Becoming Elephant: the Orphans of Reteti
programme.desc: Balance the pain of goodbyes with hope for the future as a generation of rescued elephants are finally released. Welcome new additions to the Reteti family, including a baby elephant rescued from a watering hole and a traumatized zebra named Kisima.

programme.title: Tusker: Brotherhood of Elephants
programme.desc: Become immersed in the intricate lives of tuskers with Craig, Pascal, and Esau, three male African elephants in all stages of life. Get a rare glimpse into the subtle language, complex interactions, and deep bonds of the world's largest land mammal.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta's loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix's search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.desc: Cleve Kelso breaks Rafaela Moreno and a dangerous, cybernetic prisoner named Matsuo Mori from a high-security ice prison. While Tony is grappling with his identity crisis, Echo struggles to survive spy school, and Ms. Nowhere and Gary disappear in a massive North African storm during their hunt for Cleve. Echo must lead the Toretto crew and finish Ms. Nowhere's mission - what could Cleve be up to in the desert?

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. Ramadan juga bulan turunnya al-Quran dan mengandungi Lailatul Qadar yang lebih baik daripada seribu bulan. Bulan ini penuh rahmat, keberkatan dan peluang untuk mendekatkan diri kepada Allah SWT.
